resources.string: Hooray, you're here! The day just got better - enjoy the following tips!
A section of text like this is known as a text segment. Start rockin' your translations now!
Arriba, Arriba! Andale, Andale! Be fast as Speedy Gonzales. Just hit the DOWN key to save and go to the next text segment, once you're done.
Houston, we have no problem. Keep track of the progress of your translations by statuses at any time.
You can change the status by using one of the shortcut keys: e.g. CTRL+ENTER = Translated.\n You can see other shortcuts by clicking the Sign Off button

We just like to see you happy, that's why RWS checks automatically check translations for predetermined criteria.\nAmong other checks RWS verifies if %s used in the original text are also present in translated texts.
